duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development and execution of comprehensive data analytics and reporting strategies to support business operations and maximize end user's potential.
Oversee and manage the refinement of datasets, models, and tools for complex data analytics services, providing support to internal and external clients.
Manage and supervise the Commercial Informatics staff, including mentoring, work product review, and documentation of technical specifications.
Ensure adherence to industry and enterprise best practices in vendor-supplied technical solutions and support strategic partners' operations.
Oversee the expansion of ad hoc reporting to include support for Emblem Health business, developing a knowledge base of EH-related products/platforms and corresponding warehouse data.

Create and maintain the 'single source of truth' reporting for all Fixed-Funding related business, including monthly financial statement calculations/reporting used directly in reserving and finance capacities.

Develop, maintain, and enhance datasets, models, and reporting related to Fixed Funding Solutions, Large and Small Group external reporting, Underwriting and Actuarial Rating Models, Predictive Analysis, Membership, Provider.
Serve as the point of contact for data feed development and testing, as well as represent the department in support of IT Enterprise Data Warehouse initiatives.
Develop technical processes when formal IT resources are not available and perform data analysis to support new ad hoc requests from management.
Partner with all IT and business areas to identify opportunities to improve operational and service-related processes through improving the existing application portfolio functionality.

Ensure the development, implementation, and enforcement of policies, procedures, and best practices for operational efficiency, data management, and department standards for SQL Server's suite of tools inside HCM.
Collaborate with Business & IT Leadership Team to inform and facilitate implementation of migration plan to new architectures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics, Statistics or Financial Management; MBA preferred.
